attributes.action: Save the Portage Service in Bath, which is the only outreach early learning provision for special needs children, aged 0-3 years, in the community.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Bath Portage Service has been going for 30 years. It provides specialised and experienced early learning educational activity through play, to mentally and physically disabled children, aged 0-3 years. 

Portage workers go into the child's home to work with both the child and their families, providing the basic building blocks of how to start engaging and teaching a mentally impaired child, preparing them for school, and to compliment a pre-school environment.  

It is the only educational service that engages directly with the youngest and most vulnerable members of our community, in an endeavour to provide them with a strong foundation of  skills from which their future learning can flourish.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Bath & North East Somerset Council in the first instance.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
